name: Ctf-service-status-monitor
tagline: Capture the Flag Service Monitor created for a hacking competition at my university
body:
### Project Description
This project was created in my spare time to display services and their current status on a monitor during a Capture The Flag Hacking Competition hosted by my university and show that information in the booth for my team. 

### Usage
README still needs to be generated. Code is commented on proper usage. IPs are set in the config file along with service ports. More information to be updated soon.

### Authors and Contributors
This project has been created solely by Logan Simpson (@logepoge1)

### Support or Contact
Please direct any questions to logepoge1@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
